description: Specifies the weight of this item when stored inside another Storage Item.

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Storage Weight Modifier Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Specifies the maximum weight limit that a storage item can hold

fields.title: Weight In Storage Item
fields.description: The weight of this item when inside another Storage Item. Default is 4. 0 means item is not allowed in another Storage Item.
